summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Building and Construction Codes: amending Chapter 22.400 of the Seattle Municipal Code, the Seattle Mechanical Code; adopting Chapters 2 through 9, Chapter 11, and Chapters 13 through 15 of the 2003 International Mechanical Code; amending Chapter 2, Definitions; Chapter 3, General Regulations; Chapter 4, Ventilation; Chapter 5, Exhaust Systems; Chapter 6, Duct Systems; Chapter 8, Chimneys and Vents; Chapter 9, Specific Appliances, Fireplaces and Solid Fuel Burning Equipment; Chapter 11, Refrigeration; and Chapter 15, Referenced Standards; adding a new Chapter 1 related to administration, permitting and enforcement; and repealing the 1997 Seattle Mechanical Code.
